property.name: Max Random Delay
property.description: A random value between 0 and this number will be added to the timer's start time.

property.name: Loop
property.description: When the timer reaches 0, it will reset back to its start time and start ticking again.

property.name: Auto-Start
property.description: The timer will start ticking immediately on load, without waiting for a script message to start it.
